content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside of work in a dark area just watching the sky. i saw a few planes in the air, probably taking off and landing at norfolk intl airport..A bright white light caught my eye as it was travelling fast like a jet plane, but had no exterior lighting of any jet plane i have ever witnessed. i was less than 5 miles from nasa's wallops island facility. the bright light was at high enough of a elevation that at first i thought it was a star, but it moved quickly and suddenly changed direction from a n flight path to a w flight path. i attempted to take a video on my iphone, but this object wasnt picked up on the recording, which is odd considering how bright this object was. i am a history major and studied military history and my grandfather was chief of flight operations at nasa in the past. i know what i saw wasn't any commercial or nasa aircraft. i know it wasnt a meteor due to the speed and flight path. unless the international space station is a glowing bright object or unless a satellite( which i wouldnt recognize) was right over head at the time, then i have no other explanation for what i saw.
content.summary: Bright light moving faster than plane but slower than meteor, changed direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friend's home approx 15 miles away from my home town, marengo. he was bringing me back to marengo after watching a movie that evening. (we were 100% sober). we had almost reached hwy 6, we were traveling north. i noticed an extremely bright, glowing stationary light ( blue-ish white) in the western sky. i said, "is that that bright planet? it seems lower and brighter." he replied that the planet venus, was further to the right of the bright light, or north, and i saw the planet then. he said, "well, it has to be a plane then, or a new tower light or something." i knew there were no towers in that area, and we had seen a few planes earlier, since we are near the cedar rapids airport. we reached us hwy 6, stopped at stop sign, and turned left (west) onto hwy 6 towards marengo, & towards the object. it's 4 miles to marengo and our turn into town, going north, at the ampride gas station. as we drove, we rolled down our windows, drove slowly, about 45mph, and never took our eyes off the hovering light. as we neared the object, it stayed stationary, approx 25 ft off the hwy from us, hovering over a cornfield( which had not been planted yet) about 75 feet in the air. the object was triangular in shape, a solid black color, with criss crossing, almost fluorescent looking bar shaped lights all across the bottom of the entire craft, mainly white and bright blue. we were in absolute shock. we had to turn right, off the hwy, to head into town. we instead turned around in the ampride drive to keep observing it. just as we did that and were going to go back the way we came to keep watching it, it suddenly started moving slowly east, but steadily. it looked huge, and it was just gone. we started driving into marengo and i turned to the right, looking east, to see if i could spot it. it was hovering 4 miles away near the highway intersection, exactly where we had turned west onto hwy 6. it went 4 miles in approximately 2 seconds! we just stated at each other, basically in shock. i have always been a believer, and have had a few incidents in my 50 years of life. but my friend, who is a sports editor, photographer for the des moines register, and has been for over 30 years, had never really truly believed in ufos, aliens, etc.... and he takes his camera with him everywhere, but for some reason, forgot it. he called the ampride station, they didn't see it but thought it was very cool. we bring it up in conversation frequently, if not daily. we were almost directly under it. i've never seen anything like it in my life...There was no noise, and the speed of it was nothing of this earth.  it went from hovering near the highway with bright lights, noiseless, to hovering again directly east, 4 miles away, in under 2 seconds. we will never forget it. def a ufo.
content.summary: 2 witnesses to a 75 ft. triangular shaped hovering, silent craft, bright lights, for 10 mins.

content.detailedDescription:
I left my mum's home at approximately 9:45pm on the 29th of july 1997. i intended to walk home as i did not live too far away.

there was a power cut and all of the street lights in the local area were out of action. as i walked down her garden path to make my way home i stopped for a moment to take in the night sky as the stars were very bright that night.

i started turning my body towards the northern sky to see if i could find the big dipper/plough formation and then to my left, in the western sky, i noticed movement. 

i turned to visualise on whatever it was that was making this movement. i then saw two egg-shaped craft that were flying parallel to each other suddenly come flying over my mum's home. they were roughly 20 feet apart and they were flying at probably no more than 70 feet above ground level. i would estimate the length of the craft as being somewhere between 30-35 feet, and the height at the widest point of the craft as being somewhere around 12-15 feet. i estimate their speed was probably no more than 70mph/112kph, and it seemed as though they were trying to blend-in with the night sky by using some form of technology that projected the night sky onto the outside of their craft. this technology was failing though as the two craft kept flickering for a split-second before the whole of each craft became visible again. it was not possible for me to make-out what colour the craft were as it was too dark, but they made a slight noise as they passed overhead which sounded like air being blown quickly out of pursed lips for a couple of seconds. the two ufo continued flying in a straight line in an easterly direction and i lost sight of them within 5 seconds as they passed over the roof of the house opposite my mum's home. i ran out into the street to see if i could still see them through the gap between the two house on the opposite side of the street, but i could not see them anymore. 

if i hadn't have been looking directly up into the sky that night i would not have seen them and nor would i have suspected that two ufos had just flown over my head. they had no lights nor any other distinctive features, and the sound they made was so slight i would have assumed that birds had just flown over. 

i couldn't sleep that night as i was too hyper. over the next two weeks i had three very vivid dreams about grey ets, so make of that what you will.
content.summary: Two egg-shaped ufos passed almost directly above my head. they were flying low and the ufos were trying to blend in with the night sky but their technology flickered so i was able to see the ufos.

content.detailedDescription: Cylinder cigar traveling north east to south east straight path unbelievable site but beautiful i know what i saw it's amazing true believer. this object was going in to mexico crossing the rio grande river.
content.summary: Cylinder cigar type extremely shiny almost like plantinum color

content.detailedDescription:
Chicago 1957-58.
playing ball in the schoolyard, i noticed two bright objects (silent,) moving in a southern direction! maybe travelling at 300 mph., they continued to move until, at about 10% above ground level, they merged with about 3 other bright objects, whereupon they circled each other, changed colors, green, reddish, and maneuvered that way for about 3-4 minutes, after which they just disappeared! i coaxed a friend to go with me to the nearest phone booth (ancient history,) and i called either the weather bureau or some other agency! the woman who answering the call took a minute to consult someone, then responded by saying that "there were no reports of anything!" 

henderson, nv., 2002-2003.
early morning about 8:00 o'clock or so, i was waiting in my vehicle, in my daughter's driveway, when i looked up and saw two round, silent objects, clearly distinguishable as round, with no fuzziness whatsoever! maybe 5000 feet, but fairly close to the ground! the startling thing about the event was that the 1st. white object was camouflaged, yes, camouflaged on the underside like a military vehicle, going in a slightly arced northwest direction! the 2nd. object trailed behind the 1st. camouflaged object, as if watching the performance of the first object! this was just west of tammy's building, but still in the henderson boundary! the trailing disc was pure white, and had to be 20-25 feet in diameter! 

note.. as my eyes are pretty much focused up, rather than down, i have seen a few other "sightings," one that was just about 1 block away from me going along the north avenue beach (chicago,) going northward early in the morning while biking my way to the va hospital on east huron street!! it was wobbling and going quite slow! it had to be 20-25 feet in length, but since i was viewing it from the side, i only assumed that it was round! 

then there was the hard, stone-like object i actually "ripped off" a "fleshy outgrowth" from under my left armpit! i had never noticed an outgrowth there before, so i was really surprised! this was in june of 2015, and i always washed my armpits, so i would have noticed something there earlier! maybe another time i will go into a little more detail, but i am sure i said enough already! thanks twa... larry rybicki was one witness.
content.summary: Two silent balls of light directly overheard going south in chicago.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten out of work went to go pick my friend joe up, then went to the store to buy some snacks after i drove to my house and parked my car in the alley where i always park my car we were eating and it was like 2am out of no where i see a light and i tell me friend joe. at first i thought i was trippen out or something but then he seen it also. we both were wondering if it was a plane or something but it wasnt because plains dont move in many directions and this object had lights going on around it also. this object was probably like 2miles away from us at first but then we seen a plain heading its way  and the object took off real quick. 10 mins pass by and i told my friend joe hopefully we dont see no more crazy stuff, well then this object decides to reappear again and it was more closer then before. i was lowkey scared cant lie im pretty sure he was feeling the same way also.Once the ufo got closer it scanned houses with this blue beam kinda like a laser but thick,it also scanned us and we were inside the car,when all this happened their was two other witnesses walking in the alley and i'm pretty sure they seen it too but we didn't know them.After all that happened i went inside my house and couldn't believe what i just seen.
content.summary: Unexplainable, unbelievable something you just have to see on your own to see where im coming from.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving south on my street then i looked up and a saw a pink fireball object in sky, it moved quite quickly and then fell abruptly.
content.summary: Pink fireball, moved frequently then fell abruptly

content.detailedDescription: A pic was taken a few seconds earlier and nothin showed up on that , this was taken on a lads phone through the fencing and it made his screen go blank 4 a few seconds ................... the bright light on the left we believe 2 b the portal .There is no lamppost it was in total dit was on a disused station platform with no lights of any source and the windows r boarded up!
content.summary: It was on a disused station platform with no lights of any source and the windows r boarded up!

content.detailedDescription:
I signed off my computer, and i had a strong feeling to go and open the dens window.  i rolled up the blinds and there it was staring up at me.  it spoke to me telepathically - don't worry i won't hurt you.  i was fixated on it's face and how the slow rain drops made it blink.  i kept saying telepathically to it, where is your hair, why don't you have any eyebrows, why don't you have any hair, what happened to your hair.  our eye contact was kept for at least 5 minutes. the tiny nostrals, slim lips, no eyelashes or eyebrows, the greyish skin colour, the large head, the eyes were blinking from a few rain drops falling into it's eyes. big almond shaped eyes dark eyes but no whites in the eyes.  it appeared and felt if i may say like a female, or felt femine to me. i felt parts of the back of my head tingling, perhaps it was reading my mind or trying to put me in a trance, which i did break out of and after about 5 minutes i just out of the blue closed the blinds quickly. stopped took a breath and knew i had to open those blinds again and i did but it was gone.  i looked out every window and turned the back lights on, throughout the entire house, but no sign of anything.  my mother heard me close the blinds so quickly she asked if everything is okay, i said yes.  i could not tell her at that moment what happened as she slept alone on the main floor, but i did tell her the next day.  after that, i had weird dreams, a dream of how to create electricity without wires, and funny how everyone i met was talking about tesla.  i have also seen ufo ships many times.  alone and with others.
i have had so many strange happenings throughout my life, but was afraid to say anything as others do or may not understand!
content.summary: It telepathically lured me to open the window, i opened the blinds n ut was looking right at me saying, i won't hurt you

content.detailedDescription: Driving along noticed bell shaped object hovering.I thought it was a drone but there were no propellers or anything. couldn't hear any sound. i was compelled to keep looking at it and trying to get a closer look. we watched it for as long as it was in view. i wanted to stop my husband said no . he immediately said it looked like hitlers bell i never heard of hitlers bell til this. there was 2 of us who saw it in clear daylight but when we took the pictures it seemed they came out blurier or more unfocused.
content.summary: Driving and me and one other person  observed a bell shaped object hovering.Appeared to have a nazi or s logo

content.detailedDescription: my fiancee' and i had just walked out the backdoor and i noticed a 'flash' in the sky. they (there were 2), seemed to be about 200 feet high and rectangular shaped and moved in a 'fluttering' reflective-like fashion. the only time we could actually visibly see them was when they 'flashed'. it's hard to describe. they also moved very quickly away from each other- very fast! they also were moving to the east and higher up as they went. as for their general movements, they just seemed to 'flutter/reflect' around each other is the best way i can describe it. also, the further east they went, the harder it was to see them, eventually just star like dots then they were gone. it also looked like each object gave off a sort of wispy, cloud like, whitish emission, but i can't be sure because it was so faint. they moved very fast around each other but slower as they rose up higher. i tried to focus in on them with binoculars and my fiancee' tried to take video of them but it was nearly impossible because they 'flashed' so quickly. we were able to see them from 2:00 p.M. until approx. 2:20p.M.
content.summary: 2 objects that appeared to be rectangular shaped, flashed and fluttered, slowly ascended.

content.detailedDescription: Taking pictures of clouds and lightning i took 5 random pictures. i was deleting when i noticed something in frame 3. as iblew it uup,  there appeared to have a solid image.  but it had no wings.  and a clear halo and the clouds around it appear to have a wake surrounding it.  there was no sound.  i see planes headed north to the airport all the time. but it looks like it's headed sw in a hurry, so fast that my eyes were scanning for a good 5 minutes searching for cloud structure and or trying to catch lightning flashes.  it appears i caught more than that.
content.summary: Of 5 framed shots this appeared  in frame  3.

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting in a vehicle chatting , saw lights ( red and white ) in the distance .
we thought it was a plane . it went from far off in the distance to directly above us . it hovered with strange colour lights . it was a clear night that night ...It didn't make any noise whatsoever . there was four of us in the vehicle and we all saw the same thing ...When it took off we all looked at each other in awe...We couldn't believe what we had just seen . after it took off we went looking for it in the area we had seen it go but saw nothing.
content.summary: Saw lights in the distance then within a few seconds it was directly over us , strange light hovering for a few minutes then took off so fast we saw a streak of light behind . we found out later that other people had seen something strange that same night

content.detailedDescription: There are so many things occurring here. my basement in my home is flooded with orbs, reminds me of lawrence  welk. and 2 marshmallow shape  sprung up out of nowhere and changed  colors blu,green  purple  pink as it was spinning, i  have  this on vedeo too  and many  vedeo of the orbs too. pictures i attached  were from back yard.
content.summary: I have 40,000 photos of unexplained  ranging from big faces,animals human, and other creatures not from here.

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba sacando una foto a un helicã³ptero, despuã©s de sacar la foto la mire mas de cerca y vi un objeto extraã±o.
el objeto era negro y paresia ir en linea recta, cuando lo vi le mostrã© la foto a mi familia y era algo difã­cil de explicar.
no pudimos ver cuando se fue porque lo vi cuando mire la foto.

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba sacando una foto al helicã³ptero.Y cuando vi la foto note un objeto y acerque la imagen y vi algo que no podã­a explicar.
me parece que era algo extraã±o ya que no paresia una nave o un aviã³n,el objeto se ve negro y iba en linea recta.
cuando vimos este objeto no pudimos descifrar lo que era.
no pudimos ver cuando se fue porque no lo vimos al momento de sacar la foto solo lo observamos a ver la foto del helicã³ptero.
content.summary: Era negro y parecia que estaba volando en linea recta.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside having coffee, suddenly looked up and noticed 2 tiny luminous white ovals flying from west to east at between 5-10 thousand ft. in the northern sky.  they were "bobbing" up and down, so i thought they were birthday balloons or trash bags.  after 2 minutes, a third appeared from nowhere.  the sky was cloudless in that area.  then all three continued easterly, bobbing up and down but flying in formation.  i have never observed anything "bobbing" yet moving at at least 100 mph.  it was like they were dancing.  from my viewpoint, they were tiny and high up yet driven and brilliantly white.  even though i wear corrective lenses with tint and polarization, i had to put my hands around my eyes to separate early sunlight/distortion. about 5-6 minutes later the air force appeared with 6 planes about 30-40 thousand ft up spraying "chemtrails" (they always start (here) from the north and fly south before changing directionally and fly west to east).  today the planes started from the north and minutes later they began a diagonal pattern from the north, not the usual checkerboard pattern.  the 3 oval/orbs continued easterly until they left my vantage point and probably continued over the cascade mountains.  this is my 3rd sighting of (ufos?) since 1962, and my second sighting this year.  strangely, i feel that i will have future observations.
content.summary: 2 white ovals were flying up and down moving east, a third appeared from nowhere and followed

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving to go to my grandparents house when i was around 12 years old. while leaving at 10:30 i looked up through the backseat window and saw a orange orb hovering somewhat over the baseball fields across from the entrance to my neighbor hood where i was in the car when this happened. i watched this orb for a solid 30 seconds as the object hovered, and then all of a sudden accelerated are amazing speeds leaving a trail as if it were a commet in the sky. (0-3,000 mph) all of a sudden i realized that that object wasn't anything man-made and got a extreme sense of being paranoid like something was out to get me. the next day i slept in the middle of the day because i couldn't sleep the entire night. i kept my eyes open the entire time for some reason, because i was just resting. all of a sudden when i tried to get up, i couldn't. i was completely immobile, but at the same time strange things were happening around my room. i heard a weird "whomb" sound over and over like a machine was running keeping me still. even though i didn't see anything, i knew that there was someone in the room with me. i don't know how to explain this, but my "6th" sense was going insane. i felt as if i was a toy to this 'creature' that was in my room with me. i looked this up and found it being a condition of sleep paralysis where victims seem to be immobile and feel and see weird figures in there room. since i saw the ufo the night before, i have always blamed e.T.'s for my sleep paralysis and the orb.
content.summary: Object hovered for 30 seconds, then darted across the sky at amazing speeds. +sleep paralysis.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out of my car and looked up to see a bright object moving to the west..
content.summary: Object was moving slowly to the west

content.detailedDescription: Around this time last summer, i was heading home very late ( around midnight) from a viewing of guardians of the galaxy, super great film. it is my friend who is driving, myself who is in the passenger seat, my twin sister who is in the back, and my friend's twin sister as well in the back with her head out of the sun roof (who also witnessed this ufo). i am texting on my phone and happen to look up to see an almost torpedo shaped object glide across the highway, over our car, and disappear right above the trees. the object also had three, emerald green lights evenly space from front to back and on the very back, i saw a soft orange light, which very much reminded me of the lights running up and down the ramps in a movie theater to illuminate the feet. something that makes me want to report this after it has been a little over a year is doing some random ufo research and seeing this sighting called the chiles-whitted ufo sighting (look it up). what sparked my utter shock while reading about this was the fact that the description of the object that the two men have matched mine almost exactly. this inspired me to find an artist illustration which almost brought me to scream with excitement, it was the exact same object i saw but back in 1948.
content.summary: Riding in a car and saw this ufo through windshield right above car. another friend also saw

content.detailedDescription: At 11.30 pm over my residence; i observed a dull reddish light moving rapidly downwards from south to north, midway above the horizon. i first thought it was a shooting star, until it became larger and stopped moving for a few seconds; my next thought was a large bird, until i realised it must be the size of a jumbo jet and had a dull reddish aura; it's colour was matt mid grey / white. it was shaped like a boomerang, but held vertical, with a teardrop centre; the object had no markings, no moving parts, and made no sound. it then accelerated horizontally and disappeared. i have some understanding of physics and engineering, but i can't explain what i saw; as it moved too fast for its relative size, had a perpetual aura and no noticeable engine or cockpit; i was left feeling nervous but excited, to witness something unexplainable and hope reporting this helps all of us understand these phenomena.
content.summary: Observed white grey object with reddish aura hover then accelerate

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping out at a local county park on 8-30-14 sitting at the picnic table enjoying the night as i did not have to work that night.As i was sitting there i was facing the east looking south out towards the lake.I noticed a red orb moving in a north to south path.It frightened me enough and surprised me enough that i instantly started filming a video with my phone a samsung galaxy s3 as it was moving along its flight path.I watched it as it moved towards the horizon in the south.It appeared to pulse in color change from red to orange not real fast but more gradual in change.It vanished over the horizon and in a few minutes it re appeared from the south only to travel about half of the sky before stopping and going back to its original heading.I am not sure of its exact altitude but it had rained that day and it was still covered with clouds and this orb was under the cloud level.I was visibly shaken as i texted my sister about this event.It isnt my first experience with ufo's and since i like astronomy i knew it wasnt a sattelite or a plane that i have ever seen.I have seen sattelites and meteors and even watched the iss as it passed overhead once.I was wondering the next day if it would be back i even expressed that thought to my sister.
the next day 8-31-14 as i was sitting around getting ready for work that night i kept looking to the north to see if it would come back.I was not disapointed. at approx 9:12 pm it appeared again i started taking a video but i cant hold still long enough to take a steady video so i started taking some pics again with my samsung galaxy s3 only thing is my flash was turned on.I did not want the orb to see the flash but i was too late.I turned off the flash and started taking pictures again without the flash.The orb slowly continued its previous flight path of north to south.The orb went off the horizon in the south it was at approx the same altitude as the previous night.Then as i was looking a southerly direction it re appeared moving in a northerly direction,it traversed only a little ways from the horizon when the orb started running a east to west pattern what i would call a search pattern.The orb covered approx half of the sky in this pattern back towards my location,i was getting concerned that it was looking for the source of the flash,you could see the orb as it made its turns going east to west and then back west to east repeatedly.The orb seemed to vary in its color from bright red to an orange color.It finally made its last turn and got to almost its original path heading south when it stopped running its pattern and turned to the south and vanished over the horizon.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: It was under intelligent control changing diretions and running a search grid pattern

content.detailedDescription: Shooting basketball hoops at home. major flight path for jetliners above house east to west out of sanfranciso. been a major flight path over stockton for 50 years that i know of. anyway, what cough my attention was after taking a basketball shot. i saw a object higher then i had ever seen a jetliner before. crystal clear day in march after a major storm. not a cloud in the sky. no wind. i stopped and just stared at the object amazed at its height. sun very bright reflecting off of it. out of the sw sky at shooting star speed comes another object. it stops instantly beside the other object at a matching speed. changing its direction instantly to match the first objects. both now estimated  to be reg jetliner speed.  the two continue at that speed for 1 min. then from 90% above me they shoot off perfectly side by side at shooting star speed crossing 45 % of the horizon. side by side like chained together. making a perfectly side by side 40• turn at shooting star speed. just like hitting the side of a pool table. instant a 40• turn.  in perfect unison side by side. at shooting star speed. a turn that would of destroyed a human and any human craft know to exists. in the blink of a eye they crossed the sky. completely silent the entire time. i'm a god fearing man but i will place hand on a stack of bibles and swear to these events. worm hole, they don't need a worm hole. gives me goose  bumps whenever i think of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: One at jetliner speed another at shooting star speed stops instantly beside other. both instantly at shooting star speed with pool table banking turns cross sky in 1 second. etc.

content.detailedDescription: Looking out my girlfriends window and found a strange light moving left and right. disappeared twice and reappeared twice. i left to go home and sleep with the light still visible in the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Weird light unlike any other normal light ive seen. apeared out of no where and disappeared and reappeared again

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Standing on the deck facing se appears nearly every night the same unknown flying object. oval in shape it will stretch and thin to half moon or into a bell shape, moving up or down left or right horizontally in any direction, slow and fast speeds stop instantaneously. hover in one place, fade to a small spec and come into view and seem to multiply its original size by 10x, constant color change, colors seem to sporadically move across the mass, very bright to dim, has mass that just seemed to eject from it, also have seen mass that seemed to be absorbed,amazing and intriguing. ive been watching it for nearly a year, almost every night it appears in the same area in the sky. it seems to just move out of view, other times it fades untill its just a tiny spec then gone. and can appear the same way. i do not have the equipment to record or photograph it properly. have tried and its too dark and too far away for the camera on my phone. i believe with proper equipment this would prove to be a very insightful and educational experience, especially since the object appears nearly every night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: sphere shape that would stretch to half moon shape also into a bell shape, fluctuating brightness,  constantly changing colored lights moving  sporadically across the  mass, hovered, fast slow movement all directions, visible most nights. consistently

content.detailedDescription: Around may 2015 me and my two friends were having a smoke in a well known field in sooke at about 1 am when i jokingly starting video taping and shining my phone light up in the sky and started yelling, "aliens abduct us take us to your planet were screwed here, shine a light on us shine some hope," when all of a sudden we all witnessed a bright light zoom across the sky where we were yelling. stunned we watched the video i had of it over and over again. in that moment i knew something weird was going on. then a bright flashing orb showed up in front of us, i kept video taping. the light bounced around in the sky then headed for the moon, it flew a half circle around the moon almost looking like it was in the moons gravity for a bit then it started heading faster and faster towards us. as it got closer it was most definitely going to land in the field we were in. realizing this we ran to my friends house that was only a minute away. i thought they landed and were coming for me for welcoming them to abduct me so i was freaking out, my other two friends were fascinated and made me go back out, it seemed everywhere we looked we saw a different shaped ufo appearing then disappearing in the sky, all of them were different. at one point while observing a ufo we all blacked out. we all felt as if we were abducted that night. even though i caught more than 5  ufo's on tape, a day later my cell phone and the videos disappeared out of thin air. but i have two witnesses that were with me that will never forget that.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I never expected to see and experience what i believe was aliens until one off night where i yelled some things at the night sky that i shouldn't have.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my nightly exercise walk when all of the sudden i saw two fireballs doing figure 8 movements and kept hovering in and out of sight. i was lucky i had my smartphone to catch the last 30 seconds before they finally flew off.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dancing fireballs that had cotrrolled movement. refer to short video i captuered.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette on my deck and a flash caught my eye i stared at where i saw the light and it flashed again the third time it flashed i seen it move really fast to the left and left like a trace of light then while still looking trying to follow it it flashed 2 more times not moving then got really bright and slowly started moveing north as i followed it the light dimmed and went out the i observed a flashing red light going twards the east right over me with no sound the red flashing thing had 3 squate res lights flashing when that went over the trees and i couldnt see it any more i looked back to the last place i seen the bright light go out and it was lit up hovering and very very slowly moved to the west i have never seen anything move that slow and it got brighter and brighter like a star and kind moved up and down till iy got behind trees and hovered again i watch it for about a half hr and went in to take a shower. while in the shower i had a very calming welcoming peaceful feeling and it felt like a presence and i envisioned a blueish figure with like a silver cover over the blue but it was all together its hard to explain but its presence was overwhelming theres more to story of a conversation but i feel foolish talking about that!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looking straight up a flash/ pulse bright white light caught my eye

content.detailedDescription: Was out side to smoke a cigarette. looking to the west i saw a strange strobing light in the sky to the west. it was orange red and yellow. there was no sounds comming from the object. it was visible for a minute before it disappeared.
content.summary: Orange, yellow, red flashing round shape moving across the sky a high rate of speed then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard smoking...Something caught my eye so i looked and all i could see was 4 very large bright lights i ran over to the fence to get a better look and i saw a very large craft ot was at low altitude not even half way up my local water tower i yelled for my fiance and by the time she got where i was it was gone the craft was moving pretty fast
content.summary: Was outside smoking looked to the sky and there was 4 large bright lights flying low altitude on a large craft
